feed.title: SAP Community - ABAP Cloud
feed.subtitle: ABAP Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Equivalent function ‘ENQUEUE_E_DSVAS_TRDIR’ in S4HANA
entry.content:
Hi!

  Is there a Equivalent function ‘ENQUEUE_E_DSVAS_TRDIR’ in S4HANA?

    If I needed to lock a table while the program was running, is there a command?

Thanks!

entry.title: Using Custom Business Configuration in standalone ABAP Cloud
entry.content:
Hello,
I am currently trying to follow the tutorial “Create Business Configuration Maintenance Object.”

In the third step, I am supposed to use the “Custom Business Configurations” app. Unfortunately, this app is not available in a pure cloud ABAP system (without S/4 Hana).

What are my options?
A) Can I install the application somehow?
B) Is it possible to use the BC app from another S/4 account?

Best Regards
Uwe

entry.title: How can I fetch user Default Values using an ABAP Restfull Application Programming action
entry.content:
Hello Expert,

I am currently working on an ABAP Restfull Application Programming action, which have to verify some fields, using the user Default Values as bellow :

I would like to fetch the default plant of the user (the one calling the action).
I didn't found any CDS View or API on SAP Business Hub, which would provide me with those default values.
Is there any way to do this ?
Thanks in advance

entry.title: Automatic Batch/Serial No Determination in vl01n
entry.content:
Hi Everyone,

 

We are automating batch and serial number determination during outbound delivery.

  • Batch should be determined automatically.

  • Serial numbers (received from a third-party system and stored in a custom table) should be assigned automatically when navigating to Extras → Serial Numbers.

For batch determination, I found the exit USEREXIT_BATCH_DETERMINATION.
Could you please suggest which exit or BAdI can be used for automatic serial number assignment?

Is there any Other ways to approach this requirement?

entry.title: ABAP2XLSX alternative in Public Cloud
entry.content:
Unfortunately, XCO-related classes do not fully meet our requirements; therefore, I am exploring the ABAP2XLSX class.
However, it appears that ABAP2XLSX is not supported in the Public Cloud.

Could you suggest alternative approaches to generate complex(with column grouping, coloring etc. ) Excel files in an Embedded Steampunk environment?

entry.title: Erro “Destination not found” ao usar ABAP Cloud para consumir API via BTP
entry.content:
Olá pessoal,

Estou tentando consumir a API API_BUSINESS_PARTNER do SAP S/4HANA Cloud usando ABAP Cloud no SAP BTP. Meu código utiliza cl_http_destination_provider create_by_cloud_destination para criar o cliente HTTP, mas estou recebendo o erro:  Destino não encontrado.

Verifiquei a minha subconta de teste e existe um destino chamado S4HANA_API.

entry.title: gCTS - Backup and Restore specific ABAP Object - Git
entry.content:
Using gCTS, the objects are backed up to the GitHub Repository.  If a specific object needs to be restored from Git to On-Premises System, there is no option for it in gCTS. 

It is possible to Push to Git Repository by TR/Package/Object specific. To restore, only 'Current Commit' and 'Last Repository Action' is available in gCTS. 

Purpose of restoring specific objects: If a specific Git Repo is used as backup option to Retire some ABAP Objects, in some case, the retired/deleted object specific to RICEFW may need to be restored. At that point, other Retired ABAP Objects is not needed for Restore. Only Selected-Specific objects needs to be Pulled to SAP System. 

How will I retore specific object? Any alternate way?

entry.title: Error creating transport request ERP public cloud
entry.content:
Hi Community!

I attempted to create a new, transportable package outside of the ZLOCAL component. However, the system still produces an error when I try to create the transportation.

I suspect the root cause may not be just the package type, but the extension methodology itself. My understanding is that for S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, classic extensions (like creating an ENHO object from Eclipse) are not permitted in order to maintain a "Clean Core." Instead, the recommended approach is to use the "Custom Logic" Fiori app to implement BAdIs that SAP has explicitly released for the cloud.

 

My specific question is: Is the BADI_WHT BAdI enabled for extension via Eclipse ADT in our public cloud environment, or is it mandatory that we find an alternative, released BAdI within the "Custom Logic" app?

 

I am attaching screenshots of the new error I receive when using the transportable package.

 

I appreciate your guidance in ensuring we are using the correct extensibility method for our platform.

 

Best regards,

 

Diana
I only have ZLOCAL and Z001 for superpackage

more information (my question):
https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-q-a/error-creating-badi-enhancement-implementation-quot-sap-object-enhs-cannot/qaq-p/14195538 

BaDI: https://api.sap.com/badi/BADI_FIBRREI_WHT

entry.title: ATC Cloud readiness
entry.content:
I tried integrating the cloudification repository with my custom atc variant through the following link
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SAP/abap-atc-cr-cv-s4hc/main/src/objectReleaseInfoLatest.json
I added the above link in the configs for the atc 

But since the json present in the above link has multiple checks like BAPI's,DTEL's,FM's and since i only wanted the checks for deprecated tables I thought of creating a custom SICF service which will filter the JSON from the above endpoint and return a modified json containing only the checks for deprecated tables but when I went ahead and pasted the url of my SICF service in the config section i got the following error 

Can this be fixed or is there any other way to get the result that i want.

Thanks

entry.title: Please tell me how to create an ABAP project in Eclipse and connect it to the S/4 HANA Cloud develop
entry.content:
I am looking for a way to create an ABAP project and connect to the S/4 HANA Cloud development environment. If there is a website that describes the specific creation method, please let me know.

*The ABAP environment has been set up in Eclipse.

1.In the File menu, choose New > ABAP Project.

 

2.Choose one from the list and clicked 「Next >」

3.In Connection Settings, Entered like below.
*The IP address has been identified through a ping check.

 

4.In Logon to System,Entered like below.

entry.title: Public Cloud Alternative for FM DDIF_FIELDINFO_GET?
entry.content:
I am not allowed to select from table dd03l, I tried to create a CDS on it too.
but for both I am given the error, "The use of table dd03l is not permitted".
and I can't use FM DDIF_FIELDINFO_GET.

What options are there, I need to identify table field datatype.
Thanks.

entry.title: Hide/Disable the Select option range in extension
entry.content:
TYPE-POOLS : scarr.
TABLES: scarr.

DATA: wa_res TYPE sscr_restrict,
wa_option_list TYPE sscr_opt_list,
wa_ass TYPE sscr_ass.

INITIALIZATION.
PERFORM initialization.

FORM initialization .
DATA: lv_program TYPE sy-repid,
wa_restriction TYPE sscr_restrict.

lv_program = sy-repid.
wa_option_list-name = 'S_TOEML'.
wa_option_list-options-eq = 'X'.
APPEND wa_option_list TO wa_res-opt_list_tab.

wa_option_list-name = 'S_CCEML'.
wa_option_list-options-eq = 'X'.
APPEND wa_option_list TO wa_res-opt_list_tab.

wa_ass-kind = 'S'.
wa_ass-name = 'S_TOEML'.
wa_ass-sg_main = 'I'.
wa_ass-op_main = 'S_TOEML'.
APPEND wa_ass TO wa_res-ass_tab.

wa_ass-kind = 'S'.
wa_ass-name = 'S_CCEML'.
wa_ass-sg_main = 'I'.
wa_ass-op_main = 'S_CCEML'.
APPEND wa_ass TO wa_res-ass_tab.
*wa_restriction

CALL FUNCTION 'SELECT_OPTIONS_RESTRICT'
EXPORTING
program = sy-repid
restriction = wa_res
* DB = ' '
EXCEPTIONS
too_late = 1
repeated = 2
selopt_without_options = 3
selopt_without_signs = 4
invalid_sign = 5
empty_option_list = 6
invalid_kind = 7
repeated_kind_a = 8
OTHERS = 9.
IF sy-subrc <> 0.
MESSAGE ID sy-msgid TYPE sy-msgty NUMBER sy-msgno
WITH sy-msgv1 sy-msgv2 sy-msgv3 sy-msgv4 DISPLAY LIKE 'E'.
ENDIF.
ENDFORM.

entry.title: Attachment issue in Delivery
entry.content:
Hi,

We have an interface which is used to upload pdf file to the delivery (attachment list), everything is fine in the code level, it is not throwing an error, and the file is stored in table TOAAT but file is not displaying in the attachment list. Please share your valuable thoughts.

Regards,

ravi

entry.title: Is it safe to switch from "Standard ABAP" to "ABAP for Cloud Development" if it compiles?
entry.content:
I'd like to prepare the custom code to be compatible with S/4HANA Public Cloud by switching the ABAP Language Version from  "Standard ABAP" to "ABAP for Cloud Development".

With the syntax check, I get partial information about which code needs to be rewritten (replacing BKPF with I_JOURNALENTRY, etc.)

For now, I don't want to run ATC checks for cloud-ready development, I'll do them later.

Without going to S/4HANA Public Cloud yet, if one program needs no modification, is it safe to not test it and keep the ABAP Language Version "ABAP for Cloud Development" in S/4HANA on premises?

Thanks.

Sandra

entry.title: Service Binding: Error during compilation.
entry.content:
Hi All,

On creation of  Service Binding  in Eclipse ADT - I Checked the underlying Views and Behavior Definition. It is not showing any Problem. 

Error during compilation - See next line for details. Error in entity 'ZS4T1_C_KUNDE(CDS)': Behavior definition for 'ZS4T1_C_KUNDE' has syntax errors.

Behavior Definition - As follows

managed implementation in class zbp_s4t1_r_kunden unique;

strict ( 2 );

 

define behavior for ZS4T1_R_KUNDEN alias customers

persistent table zs4t1_kunde

lock master

authorization master ( instance )

//etag master <field_name>

early numbering

{

create( authorization : global );

update;

delete;

 

field ( readonly ) Kunnr;

association _Orders { create; }

 

mapping for zs4t1_kunde

{

Kunnr = kunnr;

Name = name;

Vorname = vorname;

Firma = firma;

Str = str;

Stadt = stadt;

Land = land;

Pstl = pstl;

Sperre = sperre;

Adatum = adatum;

Fax = fax;

Telefon = telefon;

Email = email;

Url = url;

Sprache = sprache;

Bname = bname;

Passwort = passwort;

MemoTxt = memo_txt;

CurrencyCode = currency_code;

ZzumsatzZec = zzumsatz_zec;

ZzbcountZec = zzbcount_zec;

createdBy = created_by;

createdAt = created_at;

lastchangedBy = last_changed_by;

lastchangedAt = last_changed_at;

changedAt = changed_at;

}

}

 

define behavior for ZS4T1_R_PORDERS alias Orders

persistent table zs4t1_puroders

lock dependent by _kunde

authorization dependent by _kunde

//etag master <field_name>

{

update;

delete;

field ( readonly ) Kunnr, Orderid;

association _kunde;

mapping for zs4t1_puroders

{

Kunnr = kunnr;

Orderid = orderid;

Bdatum = bdatum;

Bsumme = bsumme;

CurrencyCode = currency_code;

Rabatt = rabatt;

Bstatus = bstatus;

Info = info;

createdBy = created_by;

createdAt = created_at;

LastChangedBy = last_changed_by;

LastChangedAt = last_changed_at;

changedAt = changed_at;

}

}

 

Regards

Shobhan

entry.title: Making Fields Mandatory in "Managing Purchasing Info Record" App (Private Cloud Edition)
entry.content: As per Document # 3497433 - Making Fields Mandatory in "Managing Purchasing Info Record" App is not possible in S4 Hana Public cloud edition. However would like to check if that is an option available for Private Could Edition (FPS03) and the steps to achieve this. Basically the requirement is to make two fields (available from and available to) as mandatory in the Manage Purchasing Info Record (App ID: F1982) app. This should also be work/reflected for any backend or mass upload tool for PIR creation.

entry.title: RAP Behaviour Implementation get_*_features/get_*_authorization : Should reported really get filled?
entry.content:
Hi RAP'lers,

the RAP Behaviour Implementation methods get_global_features, get_global_authorizations, get_instance_features, get_instance_authorizations have a changing parameter reported.

Is it really needed to fill this parameter? What is expected in this parameters? Where/when are they shown to the user in a Fiori Elements App?

If they should get filled, what would be the best approach?

The implementation eg in bp_demo_unmanaged_root_draft does not seem to be a sensible approach to me.

Thanks for some hints here,

  Wolfgang

entry.title: abapGit plug-in to import the ABAP Flight Reference Scenario fails "Change recording must be activat
entry.content:
@CarineTchoutouo @Andre_Fischer 

Hi guys

I have SAP system S/4 HANA PUBLIC CLOUD.   I have Eclipse installed with the latest software updates as of 11th Sept 2025 eg. ABAP Development tool v3.52

I am encountering an issue when using the abapGit plug-in in ABAP Development Tools (ADT) in Eclipse to import the ABAP Flight Reference Scenario (https://github.com/SAP-samples/abap-platform-refscen-flight.git) into an ABAP Cloud Project in our S/4HANA Cloud public edition system. The import process fails with the error: "Change recording must be activated for package /DMO/FLIGHT_REUSE." Upon investigation, the abapGit Repository import process is unable to create it. I need assistance to resolve this issue and successfully import the SFLIGHT objects (e.g., /DMO/I_Flight, /DMO/I_Travel_U) for use in an AMDP class.

Following this abap-platform-refscen-flight/README.md at ABAP-platform-cloud · SAP-samples/abap-platform-refscen-flight

I have done as instructed but I am getting that error . I have seen SAP note 3630488 - Adt Package Builder: Package creation not possible because of missing Recording Changes Flag - SAP for Me
The package creation wizard was reworked in release SAP BTP 2508, so that it now requires the new ADT client 3.52  - But I am on that version.
